product_name: X-1 Momentum Ultra Light Headphones - Women's
long_description: The women's X-1 Momentum Ultra Light headphones offer weather- and sweat-proof performance and a comfortable, secure in-ear fit with an ultra-small design that doesn't crimp on premium sound.
short_description: The women's X-1 Momentum Ultra Light headphones offer weather- and sweat-proof performance and a comfortable, secure in-ear fit with an ultra-small design that doesn't crimp on premium sound.
